Function Documentation

◆ join()

cy_supplicant_status_t join ( enterprise_security_parameters_t *  ent_parameters)

Joins an enterprise security network (802.1x Access point)

Parameters
[in]ent_parameters: Pointer to enterprise_security_parameters_t structure, parameters should be filled by user who calls this API.
Returns
cy_supplicant_status_t : CY_SUPPLICANT_STATUS_JOIN_SUCCESS - on success, error codes in cy_supplicant_status_t otherwise

◆ leave()

cy_supplicant_status_t leave ( )

Leaves an Enterprise security network (802.1x Access point)

Returns
cy_supplicant_status_t : CY_SUPPLICANT_STATUS_LEAVE_SUCCESS - on success, error codes in cy_supplicant_status_t otherwise
